name: 劉英彥
objective:
本課程將帶領學員習得電腦 2D 影像編輯繪圖軟體在視覺傳達、產品與空間設計領域的多元表現應用技能，以 photoshop 為主要表現工具，實現電腦視覺輔助設計在概念溝通、圖像表達、造型發展、情境表現的設計應用力.

The course will lead students to acquire the multi-expression application skills of computer 2D image editing and drawing software in the fields of visual communication, product and space design.

Using Photoshop as the main expression software tool, realize the design application force of computer vision-aided design in concept communication, image expression, modeling development, and situational expression.
